page.title: 17Bexhill business interview
page.content: {Nature of business?} Insurance and building society. {Local,national or international?}Local {Related to tourism?} No. {Have you an advertising campaign? Yes, advertising in local press, posters,cinema and journals. {What sex and age are the majority of {your clients?} A cross-section of the community. {Is Bexhill a good place for business, Yes-there are many old people who invest and buy property to insure. {Do you have any other branches of your {business in the S.E.?} Yes, Lewes. {How did you get started?}25 years ago I worked for an insurance company then decided to start my own. {Was it difficult to get the capital to {start?} Yes, we got capital from the banks, but it was not easy.
